name: PassiveExpiringMap_clearTest
description: Unit tests for the clear functionality of the PassiveExpiringMap class.

test_cases.name: testClear
test_cases.description: Tests the clear functionality of the PassiveExpiringMap when entries do not expire.

test_cases.name: testClearWithExpiredEntries
test_cases.description: Tests the clear functionality of the PassiveExpiringMap when entries expire after 1 millisecond.

test_cases.name: testClearWithNonExpiredEntries
test_cases.description: Tests the clear functionality of the PassiveExpiringMap when entries expire after 1 second.
